title: 1 GB nightly
info: 1 GB Internet for 1 night at the price of 25 Afghanis. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *344*41#.

title: 10 GB nightly
info: 10 GB Internet for 30 nights at the price of 200 Afghanis. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *344*42#.
